snippet: Relative inactivity of the Italian fleet and air force is due to a serious oil shortage, Spencer Williams, Columbia Broadcasting System's correspondent, just back in New York from the Balkans, reported yesterday morning....

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICA AND NEAR EAST AREAS

headline.main: ITALY HELD CURBED BY SHORTAGE OF OIL; Planes and Fleet Rendered Inactive by Lack of Fuel, Correspondent Says RESERVES LOW IN SPRING Attack on Greece Called Part of Drive on Near East to Replenish Supplies

lead_paragraph: Relative inactivity of the Italian fleet and air force is due to a serious oil shortage, Spencer Williams, Columbia Broadcasting System's correspondent, just back in New York from the Balkans, reported yesterday morning.
